name: Sandbox
body:
Sandbox is a 3D scene editor suitable to create game levels. This tool allows you to create scenes and save them to XML format.

Compiled version can be found here [http://goo.gl/D7pVL](http://goo.gl/D7pVL)

![Sandbox](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xi30kvjmnhariux/Sandbox.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
